text:
Title: Absolute Survival: The Andes Expedition (Alas de maras)
Director: J.A. Bayona
Release Date: September 9, 2023 (Venice Film Festival), December 15, 2023 (Spain), January 4, 2024 (Spanish Netflix)
IMDb Rating: 7.6/10 based on 251,324,658 user ratings
Genre: Drama, History
Runtime: 144 minutes
Cast: Enzo Vogrincic as Numa Turcatti, Esteban Bigliardi as Javier Methol, Rafael Federman, Agustín Pardella as Nando Parrado, Matías Recalt as Roberto Canessa, Simon Hempe
Crew: J.A. Bayona and Nicolás Casariego (Screenplay), Jaime Marques, Pablo Vierci, Bernat Vilaplana, and Jaume Martí (Editing), Pedro Luque (Cinematography), Alain Bainée (Production Design), Ana López Puigcerver and Belén López Puigcerver (Makeup Department), David Martí, Montse Ribe, and Felipe Bergés (Visual Effects)
Music: Michael Giacchino
Plot Summary: Based on the true events of Uruguayan Air Force Flight 571 that crashed in the Andes mountains on October 13, 1972, leaving only 16 survivors out of its original 45 passengers. This film tells the extraordinary story of their harrowing experience and survival against all odds.
Awards: Nominated for European Film Award - Best Film, European Film Awards 2023; Won Audience Award, San Sebastián International Film Festival 2023 (J.A. Bayona); Won Best Makeup & Hairstyles, European Film Awards 2023 (Montse Ribe, Ana López Puigcerver, David Martí, and Belén López Puigcerver); Won Best Visual Effects, European Film Awards 2023 (Laura Pedro and Félix Bergés).
